TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NodeLabelEditEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者完成編輯樹狀節點的文字時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user finishes editing the text for a tree node. 事件發生於使用者開始編輯樹狀節點的文字。The event occurs when the user begins editing the text for a tree node. A物件指定樹狀節點，包含要編輯的標籤的樹狀節點相關聯的新文字，以及是否已取消編輯作業。A object specifies the new text to associate with the tree node, the tree node that contains the label to edit, and whether the edit operation has been canceled. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，它會進入 「 編輯 」 狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，它會進入 「 編輯 」 狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得與樹狀節點有關的新文字。

span.span: Gets the new text to associate with the tree node.

value.span: 表示新 標籤的字串值；如果使用者取消編輯，則為 。

span.span: The string value that represents the new label or if the user cancels the edit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值是`null`如果使用者按下 esc 鍵取消編輯，或按下 ENTER 鍵而不需要修改的標籤文字。The value of this property is `null` if the user presses ESC to cancel the edit or presses ENTER without modifying the label text. 如果使用者編輯的標籤文字，這個屬性的值會是新的標籤文字。If the user edits the label text, the value of this property is the new label text. 這是 true，即使已編輯的標籤文字的最後一個值做為其原始值相同。This is true even if the final value of edited label text is the same as its original value. ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，它會進入 「 編輯 」 狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，它會進入 「 編輯 」 狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
